scripts.setup: curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh && uv venv && uv sync
scripts.codegen: uv run manage.py export_openapi_schema --api backend.views.api | uv run python -m json.tool > openapi.json
scripts.build:frontend: mkdir -p backend/static/backend && rsync -a ../frontend/dist/ backend/static/backend && rsync -a ../frontend/dist/index.html backend/views/index.html
scripts.worker: uv run celery -A backend.jobs worker -l INFO
